column1: The coronavirus outbreak is part of the climate change crisis. Therefore, climate action should be central to our response to the COVID-19 pandemic. New on our blog: https://www.firstnotefinance.com/post/the-coronavirus-outbreak-is-part-of-the-climate-change-crisis by Vijay Kolinjivadi 30 Mar 2020 https://www.aljazeera.com/indepth/opinion/coronavirus-outbreak-part-climate-change-emergency-200325135058077.html
